dict.string: A path to an AppleScript that will be used to process each new tweet that arrives. The script parameters described in the notes.
Use a custom AppleScript to process each new tweet
Show Google Search in Address Bar
Can also be toggled via menu Edit -> Spelling & Grammar -> Check Spelling While Typing
Open a new document on launch
Note: After you've changed this value once, a reboot is required after every subsequent change.
Specifies whether Xcode displays a warning when it is unable to save a project package. Useful for developers using an SCM system that makes project packages nonwritable.
Specifies whether the text editor identifies control characters using an inverted question mark.
The maximum number of concurrent shared-workgroup-build tasks.
Maximum number of distributed build tasks
Text to be displayed in the login window
Show toolbar in full screen mode
Changes how frequently Safari updates your RSS feeds.
Logs shown in the Run, Debug, and Standard I/O windows will be cleared out after each session
Auto clear Run, Debug, Standard I/O logs
Extra paths to look for Xcode plug-ins beyond the standard /Library/Application Support/Apple/Developer Tools/Plug-ins folders.
Specifies whether shared workgroup builds produce verbose logging.
Change Progress Indicator for Safari v3 and below
Ask to use new disks for Time Machine
Show file extensions in open/save dialogs
Smallest font size the system should perform antialiasing on.
Show custom icons for removable volumes
The maximum number of items to show in the File -> Recent Projects sub-menu.
Displays a warning when an undo operation on an open file would take it to a state prior to the file's last save operation.
Specifies the minimum age (in hours) a precompiled-header file must be in order for it to be a candidate for removal during a cache-size reduction operation.
Build system cache minimum removal age
Sets the maximum number of lines in labels
Specifies the period (in milliseconds) after text is selected that a click-and-drag event on the selected text is processed as the beginning of a drag-and-drop operation.
Specifies whether the text editor performs syntax coloring on files containing source code in languages unknown to Xcode.
The desired number of parallel tasks Xcode uses during builds.
The Apple Font Smoothing preference from the Appearance System Preferences.
Sets the time before highlighted text can be dragged. Negative disables
Import IE favorites on next launch

Enabling this option will download PDF files instead of showing them inside Safari. If you have Adobe Acrobat or Adobe Reader installed you also have to disable the Adobe PDF Plugin in the Preferences of Acrobat/Reader at the Internet section.
Specifies the path to the emacs binary. Use only when you want to use a custom-built Emacs editor.
Specifies whether the text editor selects text inside quotation marks when double-clicking quotation marks (' or ").
Check if another application has updated any of the open documents every n seconds (n >= 1).
Highlight the arrow of the foremost application
Sets the number of documents in the "Open Recent" menu
Single click to open a page from the drawer
The path to the xemacs editor.
Specifies whether double-clicking a quotation mark, brace, or parenthesis causes the text editor to scroll to the opposite end of the resulting selection.
Scroll to end of matching brace
Automatically reload documents without a confirmation dialogue when setting Smultron to check if another application has updated the document.
Use metal appearance in all apps
Specifies whether the built products and intermediate build files are grouped by build configuration.
The path to the shell to use for Worksheet (control-R) functionality in the Editor.

Specifies whether the text editor aligns new lines (after pressing Return) with the previous line when syntax-aware indenting (Xcode Preferences > Indentation) is unavailable for the current file, either because it's inactive or because the type of the
A portion of the screen is used instead of the full screen and the width of that portion is the same as where the page guide is shown (which can be set in Preferences).
Width of text in full screen mode
This is the equivalent of the Finders Hide All Others command. Only the foremost application will be visible, all other applications will be hidden
Open external links in existing window
Specifies whether the text editor reindents source code that is pasted when syntax-aware indenting (Xcode Preferences > Indentation) is active.
Specifies whether the text editor identifies nonbreaking space characters (Unicode 0xA0) as a middle dot.
The picture shown in the background when the login window is displayed

Basic — The default mode. Developer — Crashes are also displayed for background and system processes. Server — No crash reports are shown to the user (though they are still logged). None — Disables the dialog prompt. Crash reports are neither displayed nor logged.
Show hidden files in the Finder
Changes default arrow behavior to link to Library as default & iTunes Store on alt-Click
Arrows link to library instead of store
Sets delay time before loading a page
Enables zoom animation when opening or closing windows
Show the old "Export As HTML..." menu option
Show edited status in tab bar

Specifies the desired maximum size (in megabytes) of the precompiled header (PCH) cache. Xcode obtains the size of the cache on launch and at the end of each build. If the cache size is greater than the desired maximum, Xcode attempts to bring the cache s

Specifies whether Xcode opens the first Xcode project inside the selected folder in an Open panel when the user clicks the Open button. Using this feature may cause problems with keyboard-based navigation of Open panels.
Specifies whether Xcode attempts to preserve POSIX file permissions when saving a file.
List of NSStringEncoding values used to populate the Encodings menu found in various places in Xcode.
If set to 1 or 2 we enable additional logging for Xcode's distributed builds manager.
Draws a white gradient over the item under the mouse
Show all files in Dock menus
Displays plain text instead of HTML when both are available.
Always display mail in plain text when available
Import Netscape/Mozilla favorites on next launch
Set user idle time for timeout
Specifies whether the text editor beeps when a closing brace (}) is typed or double-clicked without a corresponding opening brace ({).
Specifies whether the text editor manages spaces when inserting and deleting spaces around words when text is inserted or deleted.
Smart whitespace for insertion and deletion
The period (in seconds) to wait after a source file is edited before Xcode starts a predictive compile. (Min: 10)
Fetch mail for only one Gmail Label
Enable spring load on all Dock items
The key equivalent which should open the gear menu in the status bar. This is a key equivalent description as used in the system key bindings file. The default value is "^\033" (control escape).
Default name for Network Login boxes
Allows Twitterrific to be configured for other servers supporting the Twitter API.
The vocal stylings of Jonathan 'Wolf' Rentzsch inform you when a posted tweet is exactly 140 characters long.

"Full Set" = ( Scale, Control, Share, Curtain, Capture, FullScreen, GetClipboard, SendClipboard, Quality ); "Default Set" = ( Scale, NSToolbarSpaceItem, GetClipboard, MultiDisplay, SendClipboard, NSToolbarSpaceItem );
Allows Time Machine to backup to network volumes
Show unsupported network volumes in Time Machine

Automatically love tracks with a rating higher than the given value. The default of 1000000 prevents any track from being auto-loved as valid iTunes ratings (scaled to the number of stars) are currently between 0 and 5.
Show Growl notification when track play is resumed from a pause.
Show Growl notifications when track is unpaused

Proxy icons providate a link from a document window to the physical file on the hard drive. By enabling this, whenever a chat is saved, a proxy icon linking to that chat will be set. Not terribly useful in most cases, but it can be done
Enable proxy icon in active chat's titlebar
When the FormatXML default is set to YES, the XML will be written formatted for easier viewing and editing.
RAW files contain several sizes of thumbnails and previews. You likely need only the largest one.
preferences.Warn if there is a problem updating meta
Warn if there is a problem updating meta
Controls whether or not the status bar is shown. NOTE: If the status bar is hidden, the down scroll arrow on long pages will be blocked by the window resize box.
Specifies whether the declarations menu in the text editor shows method declarations.
Include method declarations in declarations menu
Font size for triggers and key equivalents in menus
When this preference is set to YES, Twitterrific will log connection information to the Console. This is helpful for debugging Twitter problems.
Set the password that Colloquy uses when accessing it's web interface.
Defines an ICU regular expression that will be used to filter incoming tweets based on the screen name of the tweet.
When this preference is set to YES, "chockenberry" will be displayed instead of "Craig Hockenberry".

Yet another feature now added onto the Login Window is the ability to set up a startup delay - many of us have found either startup items in 10.3.x or modified rc.boot for this in the past when we've needed to allow the system time to finish obtaining an
Monitor the network connection for availability.
Check for network connectivity before submitting tracks
Check MP3 files for Musicbrainz IDs
When the FormatXML default is set to YES, the XML will be written formatted for easier viewing and editing. The normal value is NO.
Which custom field in CDPedia is set to the Track #?
If your host supports it (also applies when publishing locally), this sets the Unix permissions of each file.
Dictionary of extra macros for use in project and file templates.
Should the background animate or show a static star field?
Sets the default language used for a new untitled document, set to the UUID of the bundle. (Found in the info.plist of the bundle.)
( a, an, and, at, but, by, else, for, from, if, in, nor, of, off, on, or, out, over, the, then, to, up, when )
Use the following to have notices (i.e. someone uses /notice <yourname> <noticemessage>) show in a new direct chat (query) panel
Always Show Notices as Direct Chat
Display the prompt to close a window/tab if you have entered text on a form but haven't submitted it yet.
This preference specifies how many direct messages to hold in memory.
How many direct messages holds in memory
This preference changes how the view is scrolled when "keep same view" is selected. If your view is at the very top of the list, that position is maintained.
Display the note menu in the menu bar. The note menu is the *ONLY* UI entry point iScrobbler offers.
Customize the format of Growl messages: %A = album %a = artist %t = title %r = rating %d = elapsed time and duration (2.0+) %n = new line All other characters are passed through.
Adds a HD Trailers submenu in the Theatrical Trailers menu
Display ClamXav Sentry's icon in the Dock, menu bar or both
Show Sentry icon in the dock
Which custom field in CDPedia is set to the Code name?
When publishing to a remote host, how long Sandvox will attempt to contact the host for.
Specifies whether the declarations menu in the text editor shows class definitions.
Include class definitions in method popup
Create a theme like ~/Library/Syndication/Themes/mytheme.syndtheme Click More Info for details...
Input History uses arrow-keys (no option key)
Defines an ICU regular expression that will be used to filter incoming tweets based on the screen name of the tweet.
This value sets the maximum number of Growl notifications that will be displayed after a refresh. If there are more than the maximum, a summary is displayed.
Which custom field in CDPedia is set to the Album name?
Adium's built-in updater should check for beta releases.
Show update notifications for beta releases
Check for new versions of Vienna when Vienna launches
In addition to checking for new articles on refresh, check for updates to old articles
Check for updates to old articles
When the SaveCompressionLevel default is set to 0, the XML file will not be compressed
Save panoramas as 16 bit TIFF files if they are built using RAW or 16 bit files. The lens correction is to reduce barrel/pincushion distortion
Add 16 Bit TIFF and Lens Correction

Normally when publishing, Sandvox overwrites any files on the Host that it needs to. However, some servers refuse to allow overwriting. Setting this hidden preference to "YES" will make Sandvox delete and then write anew any such pages, thereby avoiding t
Specifies whether the declarations menu in the text editor shows method definitions.
Include method definitions in declarations menu
Specifies the maximum size (in kilobytes) of the SCM log.
Sets the first piece of information displayed (click to rotate through others)
Sets the default bundle used for a new bundle item, set to the UUID of the bundle. (Found in the info.plist of the bundle.)
Default Bundle For New Bundle Items
Set the port that Colloquy uses when accessing it's web interface.
This preference specifies how many tweets from your timeline to hold in memory.
How many Tweets holds in memory
The time required to hover the mouse over the control menu before the Growl track notification appears. In milliseconds (1000 = 1 second).
Disable all data tracking for local top lists.
Customize the title of the Growl play notification: %A = album %a = artist %t = title %r = rating %d = elapsed time and duration (2.0+) %n = new line All other characters are passed through.
Have DVDpedia play the linked VIDEO_TS files in VLC instead of DVD Player.

If you are publishing to your computer, and not to your Home Directory, this sets the folder that Sandvox will publish to. Useful if you have multiple copies of Apache or an alternative webserver installed.
Specifies whether the declarations menu in the text editor shows class declarations.
Include class declarations in method popup
Specifies whether the declarations menu in the text editor shows ??mark_label?? marks.
Don't submit Podcasts downloaded from the iTunes Store (other Podcasts are not marked as such by iTunes).
Automatically tag Loved tracks as "loved" and Banned tracks as "banned".
Check for new messages at launch
Display a warning when closing a window that has multiple tabs.
When the SaveCompressionLevel default is set to 0, the XML file will not be compressed. The normal value is 3.
Change document icon to Cyberduck icon while downloading
Specifies extra paths in which to look for Xcode plug-ins beyond the standard (domain)/Library/Application Support/Apple/Developer Tools/Plug-ins directories.
Specifies whether the declarations menu in the text editor shows type definitions.
Include type definitions in declarations menu
Show the destination of links in a tooltip. Note that the URL will be shown INSTEAD of title attribute, if the link has one.
Show Link URL in Tool Tip
Open Window For New Removable Disk
Make Camino complete the URL inline like Safari.
Adds Recent / Favorites item to end of Dock; alt-click on Dock item to change between Recent Apps, Docs., Favorite Items, Favorite Volumes, etc.
Add Recents / Favorite Stack to Right Side
Set the menu color for the "default" state of the iScrobbler menu.
Show Growl notifications for last.fm handshakes and submissions.
Show Growl notifications for last.fm communications
When refreshing feeds, the maximum number of feeds that will be simultaneously refreshed.
Maximum number of simultaneous feed refreshes
Enables the video sharing tab in the TiVo Desktop preference pane.
turn this OFF if startup is taking forever. Gets set to ON when you use "Advanced->Special->Scan all file sizes..."
Enables iTunes Top Movies (Movies menu), iTunes Top TV Episodes (TV Shows menu), iTunes Top Songs and iTunes Top Music Videos (Music menu)
The maximum number of page titles to show in an index when a child collection has its show in parent attribute set to be a list.
Number of pages listed in index
Specifies whether the declarations menu in the text editor shows #define statements
Specifies the location at which to save the Code Sense index, instead of the standard location.
Deleting the key will show only release builds instead of the 'sneaky peek' build train. May no longer be necessary after v1.0.1 is final.
Use default name in Network Login boxes
Allows Twitterific to be configured for other protocols, such as "https://".
If this preference is set to YES, Twitterrific will not display your own tweets. It will only display the tweets of your friends.
Delay for dragging windows between spaces
Submit tracks in batch mode. If false, submit tracks one at a time (not recommend for both submission rate performance and bandwidth reasons).
Show Growl notification when a track begins playing.
Show Growl notifications for playing track
iChat uses a short timestamp by default, such as 9:21 PM. Enabling this will force iChat to show a longer timestamp, including date and time, such as 3/1/06, 9:18 PM.
Converting RAW to JPEG or TIFF takes a while. Skipping this speeds the extraction up.
preferences.Dont warn that add to library does not copy
Warn that add to library does not copy
This adds a new pane in the Preferences windw to access the Hidden Preferences window.

By default, Amazon Lists link to Amazon products using Karelia's Associate ID. This preference lets you override this and use your own Associate ID instead when creating an Amazon List where you pick the individual products yourself. For lists which are l
Specifies whether the declarations menu in the text editor shows function definitions.
Include function definitions in method popup
Specifies whether Xcode logs its communications with GDB to a file. This file can be sent to Apple when reporting problems with the debugger.
Show indexing animation at startup even if we aren't indexing.
Number of failed login attempts before the password hint is displayed
Retries until password hint is displayed
Warn about cleartext passwords for afp
Queue tracks played in iTunes if an iPod is mounted.
Queue submissions if iPod is mounted
Display font preview in font menu
Adds Recent / Favorites item to end of Dock; alt-click on Dock item to change between Recent Apps, Docs., Favorite Items, Favorite Volumes, etc.
Add Recents / Favorite Stack to Left Side
If this is set, it overrides the 'Number of Songs to Save' pref in determining the number of stations in the radio history.
Controls the automatic empty trash behavior when quitting Vienna
Options for emptying trash on quit
Generate a playlist automatically using the criteria used to create the previously saved playlist.
Trash non-library original files after converting format

set this to true if you want to do non-library conversions "in place". Currently, when you "convert format" for a song that does not reside inside the "kJams Library" folder (ie: you used "Add To Library..." rather than "Rip..." to get it into your librar
iTunes Store used for iTunes top content (cf. Enable iTunes Store)

Force RSS the attachments in RSS feeds of images to refer to the full-size, original images, not the images scaled down to fit on a photo page. Useful if you want it to be more convenient to download large images from RSS feeds, or if you wish to take adv
Generate enclosure links to original images in RSS feeds

Specifies whether the text editor uses code completion in plain text, nonsource files. When active in these files, code completion processes only the words present in the file, along with language keywords and text macros defined for the file's type.
Allow autocompletion in plain text files
Custom Profile.AC Power.Wake On Clamshell Open
Determines if a laptop will wake from sleep when the lid is opened.
By default, the Smart Split window is limited to finding 100 splits. Removing this limit will allow the it to find more splits, but can slow the program or cause it to crash.
Location Xcode uses to store code Snapshots.
Show AppleScript Plugin debug error dialogs
The threshold size that determines if the pixel variant of the fonts are used if there. E.g. if Monaco 10 is displayed as pixels instead of antialiased.
Maximum font size to use Screen Fonts
Don't submit tracks matching these filters. You can filter on artist name, genre and path. Paths can be as specific or general as you want (down to a specific file, or any parent folder).
Use boldface in articles list to display unread articles.

Use the new mail badge that Mail uses to show the number of unread messages. For those of you who really want consistency across dock icons, you can enable this. If this option is enable, flashing the dock icon doesn't work.
Close bookmark drawer when opening connection
Disables the information display which pops up when a blocked ad is moused over.
The kind of index the new Home Page should use. You can see the list of available index types using the "Available Components" item in the Debug menu.
Specifies whether the declarations menu in the text editor shows function declarations.
Include function declarations in method popup
Identifies the gdb binary Xcode uses for debugging.
Number of seconds before Google Desktop resets it's query when it is in the background
If you're in a group environment, you may wish to hide the code in the registration window to prevent theft.
Which custom field in CDPedia is set to the Key of the song?
Specifies whether the declarations menu in the text editor shows ??warning_label?? warnings.
There is no official support for nightly builds -- they are for testing only!
Change the default sound which is automatically set for new events.
The factory default for QuickTime playback is now off, so BBEdit 8.5 and later will no longer try to interpret .m3u and .smi files as movies (which was technically possible but not really useful).
Force BBEdit to always ignore the trailing line break in a clipping's contents
Ignore trailing lines when placing clippings

Ordinarily, BBEdit will only ask you to choose a file's encoding when it can't otherwise figure out what the encoding is, and your "if the file's encoding can't be guessed" preference is a UTF-8 or UTF-16 variant. This should be fine for general use, but if for some reason you always want BBEdit to ask you when it can't guess a file's encoding, even if your preference would do the job, you can:
Always ask for unknown file encodings
The C/C++/ObjC/ObjC++ language modules generate fold ranges for any brace-delimited block that has at least N lines, where N is a preference settable from the command line.
Min length for foldable blocks: ObjC
Terminal app for "Go Here in Terminal"
This sets the default animation speed for all effects in Hyperspaces.
Specifies the file to which Xcode/GDB communication is logged when Xcode/GDB-communication logging is active. This file is rewritten for every debugging session.
Should Google Desktop come to the foreground when it is launched.
If you're in a group environment, you may wish to hide the code in the registration window to prevent theft.
The size of the font that Xcode uses to display tables.
Which custom field in CDPedia is set to Backup (Singers)?

If there is a partial word to the immediate left of the insertion point, the "Insert Clipping..." command will attempt to autocomplete that word based clipping names in the current and universal set (using a "begins with" style match.)
Use hierarchy in search Results and error results windows
The "Copy as Styled HTML" and "Save as Styled HTML" commands normally generate style information inline. If you want to use an embedded style sheet instead, set the hidden preference thusly:
Use embedded style sheet when Copying/Saving Styled HTML
The C/C++/ObjC/ObjC++ language modules generate fold ranges for any brace-delimited block that has at least N lines, where N is a preference settable from the command line.
Min length for foldable blocks: Python
Hide the bezel on the master mac when controlling another computer
Makes the icon spin in the dock when it is launched.
Which custom field in CDPedia is set to the Actual Time (duration of song NOT including leading and trailing silence)?
All links targeting new windows will be forced to go to new tabs instead. (Requires > Safari 3.1.)
Open all "new window" links in tabs

If Xcode is running, Open Selection and Open File by Name will ask it for a path to the file name; if something useful comes back, BBEdit will open it. If for some reason you are using Xcode but don't want BBEdit to do this, you can turn it off:
Autopopulate Open Selection and Open File by Name with Xcode document
Auto expand top level items in search results
BBEdit attempts to move windows as little as possible when you zoom them. To override this and let BBEdit place the window in the upper left-hand corner of the screen:

The Function Popup preferences are long gone, but you can control whether or not prototypes appear in the function menu, and whether the function menu sorts by name or not (holding down the Shift key as you open the function menu reverses this on the fly):
Show prototypes in the function menu
The C/C++/ObjC/ObjC++ language modules generate fold ranges for any brace-delimited block that has at least N lines, where N is a preference settable from the command line.
Min length for foldable blocks: TeX
Enable to show the hot borders as blue, instead of being invisible.

By default, when Schedule Helper is installed (see the Install Extras window), the machine will automatically wake from sleep to run timers. This is recommended, but if desired, this functionality can be turned off. Log out will be required after updating this for the change to take effect.
Enable wake from sleep for scheduled recordings
The factory default for QuickTime playback is now off, so BBEdit 8.5 and later will no longer try to interpret .m3u and .smi files as movies (which was technically possible but not really useful).
Open QuickTime image files as images
BBEdit uses the system spelling checker; however, if you want to use Excalibur for spell checking instead (which is useful if you do a lot of TeX/LaTeX work)
The C/C++/ObjC/ObjC++ language modules generate fold ranges for any brace-delimited block that has at least N lines, where N is a preference settable from the command line.
Min length for foldable blocks: C

Beginning with version 8.0, BBEdit stores document state (window position and various settings) in a central repository in your BBEdit preferences folder. If you wish, you can ask BBEdit to store document state in the resource fork of the document's file
Write HFS file type and creator
preferences.Max number of simultaneous QuickTime Exports
How many QT export tasks can run simultaneously? (You can still Que as many as you want)
Don't warn about deleting last song
Turn Suitcase Fusion's check for updates on/off
Warn when closing a file with unsaved changes
preferences.Dont play when you add single song to Library
Auto-Play when you add single song to Library
Warn when opening a malformed UTF-8 file
Sets where the switcher window will appear in relation to other on-screen windows.
Each new terminal window chooses a user-defined Format collection at random (affects font and colors). Requires version 3.1.
Because display sleep (and waking) can cause skips in recordings, this is off by default.
Permit display to sleep while recording
Which custom field in CDPedia is set to the Rendition?
Show attachments in the body of the email.
Show icons in multi-file Find Differences results
Warn when running a script with non-Unix line breaks

The Function Popup preferences are long gone, but you can control whether or not prototypes appear in the function menu, and whether the function menu sorts by name or not (holding down the Shift key as you open the function menu reverses this on the fly):

BBEdit's Perforce support uses the "p4 login" mechanism. This should be compatible with Perforce repositories and workflows, but if for some reason using p4 login poses a problem in your use of the built-in p4 integration, you can disable it.
Use "p4 login" to log in to Perforce
Only export a sample of the song, not the entire song
Export Entire Movie (instead of only 30 seconds)
The number of seconds you want teleport to wait before switching
Zoom factor for newly opened files. By default, new windows open at 2x zoom.
Which custom field in CDPedia is set to the Publisher name?
The name of the font that Xcode uses to display tables.
Enables the pre-3.1 Debug (internal) menu different from standard Debug menu
Disables the Quit Confirmation dialog when quitting X11.
Show icons in lists and browser windows
Show C V S directories in search
The F T P / S F T P browser no longer presents an alert to confirm bookmark selections that involve changing to a different server or account.
Confirm when opening a F T P / S F T P on a different server or account
The C/C++/ObjC/ObjC++ language modules generate fold ranges for any brace-delimited block that has at least N lines, where N is a preference settable from the command line.
Min length for foldable blocks: Java
How long should the Rotation screen be shown?
Max number of audio encoders at once when ripping / converting
Max simultaneous encoders while ripping / converting
Background Blur Radius (works only if Blurminal is installed)

By default, when Schedule Helper is installed (see the Install Extras window), the machine will automatically power on to run timers. Automatic login will need to be turned on for this to work properly. If desired, this functionality can be turned off. Log out will be required after updating this for the change to take effect.
Enable automatic power on for scheduled recordings
Full page zoom (replaces function of text zoom) in the latest webkit nightly

If Xcode is running, Open Selection and Open File by Name will ask it for a path to the file name; if something useful comes back, BBEdit will open it. If for some reason you are using Xcode but don't want BBEdit to do this, you can turn it off:
Use Affrus for Perl debugging (if it is installed)
The C/C++/ObjC/ObjC++ language modules generate fold ranges for any brace-delimited block that has at least N lines, where N is a preference settable from the command line.
Min length for foldable blocks: C++

Beginning with version 8.0, BBEdit stores document state (window position and various settings) in a central repository in your BBEdit preferences folder. If you wish, you can ask BBEdit to store document state in the resource fork of the document's file
Save document state in resource fork
Name template for when you export a 30 second sample QT movie
mail selection moves to older mail
When deleting e-mails, always move to the next item below in the list
Delete and Always Select Next Downward Message in Entourage
Displays a live preview of the selected font in all system font panels
Show preview in system font panel
If you do not have Sogudi installed, this will have no effect.
Hide palettes when arranging windows after a Find Differences operation
The C/C++/ObjC/ObjC++ language modules generate fold ranges for any brace-delimited block that has at least N lines, where N is a preference settable from the command line.
Min length for foldable blocks: ObjC++
Template name to use when showing the "Rotation" screen between songs
Forces UDF volume creation with a particular UDF revision.
Change the interval that Mail.app waits before it refreshes RSS Feeds
Keep windows arranged when clicking on an item in the differences window

Like many Mac OS X applications, BBEdit supports the "Find Scrap", a feature of the OS that enables sharing of the "search for" string between applications. Some applications put inappropriate content (such as Web search strings) on the Find Scrap, which can cause the "search for" string in BBEdit's Find dialog to be replaced when you didn't expect it.
The C/C++/ObjC/ObjC++ language modules generate fold ranges for any brace-delimited block that has at least N lines, where N is a preference settable from the command line.
Min length for foldable blocks: JS
preferences.Show Rotation when less than time remaining (seconds)
How many seconds from the end of the song should the Rotation screen come up?
Show Rotation Start Time (from end of song)
Disable floating help window in Leopard
Use a name other than the user name when creating files in Xcode
preferences.Track Number can be single digit
Turn this on to force track numbers to only be recognized if they have 2 or more digits
Track numbers must be 2 or more digits
preferences.Parens in File name always means 'rendition'
Check this box to have kJams automatically treat what is in parentheses as the "rendition" meta data field.
Parentheses in file name is NOT "Rendition"
Sets collapsible items (like projects) to appear as expanded by default. Doesn't apply to folders in the sidebar.
Enables the use of a custom application icon.
Enable the use of a custom icon
Toggles display of context popup when hovering over dates and times, addresses, and phone numbers.

Disables (the often very time consuming) iTunes iPhone backup. Control-click the iPhone to trigger a manual backup. This means you don't have an automatic, regular backup of your iPhone. Use with caution!
Avoid receiving duplicated messages (e.g. from mailing lists) by checking whether a message has already been received before routing it.
By default, if you have a custom desktop picture set in Hyperspaces, it will disable the system menu transparency when you switch to that space. This setting allows you to disable this behaviour.
allow the Escape key to invoke the "Complete"
Set the default for saving passwords in the login dialog.
Hides Genre list when browsing music; available in preferences window in versions of iTunes prior to 8.0.
Show arrows on library items that link to either iTunes Store (default) or Library (alt-Click)
Underlines "misspelled" words after you type or click them.
New bookmarks will be shared (public) by default.
Sets how long before items in Safari's history are purged.
The Web Inspector can be opened by right clicking anywhere on a web page and choosing Inspect Element.
Make the Open and Save dialogs show hidden files
The Apple logo shown when logging in
Change the MAC OS X title on the Login Window
Login Window MAC OS X Title
Uses alternating row colors in the Units list.
The font to use in the log view. Example: "Papyrus 14.0"
Toggles the display of context menus in the Units list on a control- or right-click.
Number of lines displayed by FAHlog tail
v3.3+. Supported stations will use the official BBC logos. The author is not responsible for its use and not affiliated with the BBC in any way! Don't sue him, BBC!
Show the current path in the bottom of Finder windows.
Log detailed analysis of property list structures when running OXP verifier.
Write log to stderr as well as Latest.log. Mostly useful when running from Xcode.
Workaround for rendering error where squares appear around stars and nebula components.
See the directory path to the current folder you are browsing in the title bar, instead of only seeing the name of the current directory.
Generate a GraphViz graph of the system description grammar (to aid localization).
Generate a GraphViz graph of OXP verifier stages.
Quality of anisotropic filtering, ranging from 0 to 1.
Limit size of textures. Must be at least 64.
Name display order, in the list and then in the card display
Include the username in generated autosave titles.
Layout for the main Address Book window
Text size in lists and card display. Supports negative values.
Show the iTunes Library Old School. The "Library" lists everything in your iTunes library.
Regain access to Ignore accidental trackpad setting.
Makes windows in X11 become active when under the mouse. Use for 10.5.5 and up, as apple upgraded X11 to 2.1.5.
Ignore the trackpad if mouse is detected.
Force data cache to be rebuilt each time Oolite runs.
Log mostly-useless extra information when running OXP verifier.
Enables Multi-Touch Maps and/or Scroll Wheel Action in iPhoto '09
shows the active account in each conversation
Enables the WebKit Web Inspector to debug webkit message view styles.
Disables Os X button themes check http://macthemes2.net/forum/viewtopic.php?id=16785609 for more info
Toggles Safari v4 Tab bar on top of window (new) or under address bar (previous)
Show Tabs on top of Address Bar
When creating a Colloquy Style, enable the WebKit Web Inspector.
Toggle search box suggestions from appearing when searching from the search bar in Safari v4
This preference specifies the maximum number of tweets to download when refreshing the timeline. The maximum number that Twitter allows is 200.
Prevent changes to Dock contents for all users
Sets trash icon full regardless of whether currently empty or full.
Displays an alert informing you that a file is an application the first time you open it.
Write quarantine attribute to downloaded files
Completely disable the Top Sites feature for Safari v4 and above
You need to disable this and also DebugSafari4LoadProgressStyle to re-enable the blue progress bar in the Address Bar.
"NO" hides splash screen, "YES" shows splash screen.
Default icon is a musical note. Set value "male" changes to musical note icon, "female" changes to heart icon
Change Status Bar Icon To Heart
Limit the size of each window to the size of the current head.
Don't tell X11.app to take focus when a new X11 window is created.
Don't take focus on new X11 window
Automatically quit quartz-wm (thus shutting down the X11 server) when the last window is closed.
Auto-quit X11 when last window is closed
A thin vertical line is rendered at the specified column number, to act as a margin guide. The value 0 turns off the line.
Column at which to render a thin line as a margin guide
When "Use tabs to arrange windows" is enabled, specifies which edge of the window will have the tab (as long as there is room).
Specify edge of window for tab
You need to disable this and also DebugSafari4IncludeToolbarRedesign to re-enable the blue progress bar in the Address Bar.
Enables double clicking on a titlebar to shade the window
Sessions set to send a keep-alive character on idle, do so every few minutes, according to this value.
Specify when to send keep-alive text
Sessions set to notify on idle, do so after a few seconds of inactivity, according to this value.
Specify how much inactive time triggers idle notifications
Default duration in minutes for new event
Default duration in minutes for new event
Sets the display color for invisible characters
Allows installation of IPCC (iPhone Carrier Configuration) files using iTunes.
Sets the difference (in pixels) between a font’s built-in line height and the height used in TM.

Set the timeout for the auto-quit feature. If wm_auto_quit is true, quartz-wm will wait this many seconds before attempting to shutdown. If another window is created in that time, quartz-wm will not shutdown.
Set timeout for the auto-quit feature
How often to check for new messages
The default mask to be used when creating new files.
Default mask for creating new files
Click and hold on application invokes Exposé
Use square corners instead of rounded ones.
Empty value enables snapshot caching. Value of 2 disables snapshot caching.
Draws a white gradient over the item under the mouse
Enable New List View in Stacks
By limiting the number of simultaneous authentication requests, the impact on a directory server can be reduced.
Enables Oolite to show Growl messages while in full-screen mode (assuming Growl is installed).
Show focus ring on input field
Show Chax badges on menu items
Show Growl notifications when iChat is in front
Command-Tab is "captured" by the remote machine when controlling a screen
Change the zoom button to zoom the window instead of toggling the mini player. Opt-click inverts behavior.
Zoom button zooms window instead of mini player

Normally if you hold shift while double clicking a folder on the Desktop (this can be tricky as you have to get the phase right, or else hold shift right after the second click), the animation of the window opening will play very slowly. If you somehow find yourself activating this slow animation accidentally and don't like it, you can use this preference to disable it.
Enables remote disk access (like the MacBook Air)

NSUIHeartBeat is in charge of updating animated controls, which it normally does every 0.03 seconds. If you're crazy and you'd like to try to slow down or speed up the refresh rate, you can change the cycle time (in seconds) to whatever you'd like.

This setting allows you to set a delay (in seconds) before the preview pane appears when browsing in Column mode. Note that this delays the entire preview pane (filesize, modification date, etc.) not just the preview image.
Delay before showing preview in column view
This causes the "Always open in xxx view" checkbox in the view options window to have a popup menu that allows you to choose between the various view options.
Enables remote disk access (like the MacBook Air)
Includes the name portion, with < > around the email part, like “Joe Smith <joe.smith@apple.com>
Include names when copying email addresses

By default, clicking on the Finder from another application will not effect the selected files in the Finder (eg. so you can click on the Desktop without losing your selection). This setting allows you to change that behavior, in case you really like click-through. Note that dragging always starts a new selection, regardless of the value of this setting.
Leopard appearance: use Leopard window values
"5.8.8" will make version 5.8.8 the user default when running the both the perl and a2p commands (versioner is the internal name of the version-selection software used).
Automatically show subtitles and closed captioning on open
Show the contents of folders when QuickLooking them
Show version column in search results
Dim snapshot when zooming from Top Sites
It also switches the behavior of the 'Menu' button on the Apple remote so that a single press brings up EyeTV and a long press brings up FrontRow.
Use white text for desktop icons
Show size column in search results
Show comments column in search results
Show label column in search results
Show other spaces' windows in Expose
Changes how the pieces disappear when rows are moved in from the bottom or the board is shaken up during network games/tournaments.
Changes the speed for some animations on entry levels.
Enable the headless mode (ie. no display connected) in VMware Fusion
Display IP-Addresses of the local hosts
Set Windows-friendly attachments to be the default setting in Mail.app

Test release 1.74 uses a more sophisticated mechanism for drawing missile and mine icons, which involves turning each one into two sets of triangles. This setting causes the generated triangle data to be written to SVG files in the logs folder.

Setting it to a value less than zero (e.g. -1) will disable the ability to drag a selection, meaning clicking the mouse inside a selection immediately deselects it and starts a new selection from that point (if the mouse is moved while the button is down).
Setting it to zero will immediately start a drag.
This sets the number of documents kept in the "Open Recent" menu. The default value is 25.
Allows connections to localhost (useful for SSH tunneling).
Makes windows take focus when the mouse rolls over them. Updated to work in XQuartz beta released on Nov. 7 2009.
Updated for Nov 7 2009 beta release of XQuartz.
Enable momentum scrolling for Magic Mouse

This is the scaling factor for the (ostensibly) resolution independent user interface of Mac OS X. Changes only affect apps launched after changes. (Warning: At least on Mac OS X 10.6.2 and with Safari 4.0.4, any setting other than a multiple of 0.25 appears to hose up Safari quite a bit. Other apps may also not do well with odd values for this factor...)

There are two hidden defaults which control how often OmniFocus complains about stale clients:
SyncStaleClientInterval (factory setting 604800 seconds, or one week) says how stale a client has to get before OmniFocus complains the first time.
Time for a sync client to become "stale"
SyncStaleClientComplaintInterval (factory setting 172800 seconds, or two days) says how frequently to remind the user after the first complaint.
Time between stale sync client complaints

This will make OmniFocus show nothing in the main content area when you have nothing selected in the sidebar (instead of showing everything). Then save your perspectives with no sidebar selection. Useful to speed up rendering when changing perspectives.
Display no content when the sidebar is not selected
Change the sound played after iCal or other sync activity is completed. Set to blank to disable the sound entirely. Set to a system sound to set it appropriately. (e.g. "Submarine")
Adds a reflection to contact images.
Log additional information to the console. For debugging purposes only.
Write elapsed date controller to console
Show time in the date columns. Set to a value of "YES" to enable.
Enables full page zoom (as opposed to just text size zoom), as in Safari
Generate Graphviz files of AI flow control (in the Logs folder).
Enable the "Are you sure you want to open this application?" dialog.
Automatically shows subtitles and captioning on opening a movie or audio file
Automatically show CC on Opening Movie
used @ apple / at&t / other carrier stores to activate iPhones
used at the Genius Bar for restoring devices.
If true, iCal will log HTTP activity (such as CalDAV synchronization and feed subscriptions) to the Console.

Prevent Mail.app from adding email addresses to the Previous Recipients list. Consequently, only addresses from Address Book.app will show in auto-complete when composing new messages. (You must also clear the Previous Recipients list on the Window menu in Mail.app to remove recipients that were added before this secret was enabled.)

As of the 10.6 version of Screen Sharing (v1.1.1), when controlling a remote client, function keys and key combinations for actions such as Force Quit, Log Out, and the Application Switcher are now all sent to the remote computer. You can use this hidden preference to revert to the older behavior (such "special" keys will then be applied to the local host).
Do Not Send Special Keys to Remote Machine
This will turn on a "Debug" menu where you can turn the Bonjour browser on/off since it's been disabled recently by Apple
Enables the Booklet (iTunes LP) Authering Mode. Changes the Grouping field to the XID iTunes Store field.

"NO" disables debug logging "YES" enables debug logging
For this to function, visit this page: https://developer.skype.com/Support/LogFile
sets the Carrier Name in iPhone Simulator
Hide QuickLook on deactivation or application switch
Enable slow motion with shift key on QuickLook
Shows X-ray even when folders have custom icons
Show X-ray for folders with custom icons
By default, you can only do those "in-line previews" when the icons are set at a certain size. This lets you do them at any size. (Change the "0" to any number 0-512.)
Auto stop previews when selection changes
By default if you are playing an inline preview, if you scroll down it will stop playing. This allows it to continue playing.
Control-left-arrow or Control-right-arrow to jump to the next (or previous) transition from lower-case to upper-case characters (or a word boundary, whichever comes first).
Disable contact list filtering via typing
setting to "1" disables second-screen swoosh animations in spaces

Use frontrow on your second/preferred display. In the Displays SystemPreferences move the menubar to the screen you want for FrontRow. Enter and then leave FrontRow. Switch the menubar back. Open the Console app and search for FrontRow. Convert the "display: 0x[hex ID]' to decimal. The converted number is the display ID.
Scale images by default when printing
Enable Remote Disc (Drive Sharing); make sure to enable "Enable Remote Disc (2)" as well.
Enable Remote Disc (Drive Sharing); make sure to enable "Enable Remote Disc (1)" as well.

There is a performance issue in some versions of VMWare Fusion 3 where Spotlight will attempt to search for virtual machines continuously when the Virtual Machine List window is open in Fusion, causing the whole system (Mac & Windows) to slow down. This disables the searching.
Disable Spotlight searching for VMWare Fusion virtual machines
Switches the window controls from vertical to horizontal
Customize the size of icons in icon view when using the open files panel
Hides the Ping dropdown menu that appears next to each selected song.
Experimental sidebar sorting by network and room name. (Colloquy 2.3 build 5095+ required).
This feature was added in build [4553]. It shows a badge on Colloquy's Dock Icon (like Mail.app) counting unread highlights, private messages and notices.
Show arrows on library items that link to either iTunes Store (default) or Library (option-click). Updated for iTunes 10.
Changes the debug value for SIMBL
Reverts to the, imho, more convenient modal dialog for Find/Search/Replace
Use old style modal Find Dialog

If turned off, this remaps navigation swipes from 3 to 4 fingers when the 3-finger dragging gesture is enabled (so it displaces the Application Switcher and Exposé 4-finger gestures). (NOTE: You may need to un- and re-select the 3-finger Dragging option from the drop-down after restarting System Preferences to see the changes) (Also, you might need to click the 4-finger options on and off a couple of times to get the new behavior working…)
Map navigation swipe to 3 fingers (turn this off to get 4-finger navigation swipe)

(REQUIRES REBOOT) This allows the Magic Trackpad to be used in an inverted position (with the battery compartment at the bottom edge) by enabling a system-wide auto orientation sensing mode. Once enabled (and rebooted), simply place all five fingertips on the trackpad in a relaxed position and the system will re-orient that trackpad based on the pattern of your fingertips.
Enable multitouch trackpad auto orientation sensing (for all users)
When the FormatXML default is set to YES, the XML will be written formatted for easier viewing and editing.
Disabling Spaces support speeds up restoration by not cycling through all Spaces. Desirable for Stay users who have multiple Spaces, but only want to restore the active one.
Enable the developer environment for the Textual IRC Client to allow the WebKit Inline Inspector for theme developers. — http://is.gd/ja8nT
If you do not have TotalFinder installed, this will have no effect.
New tabs open with same path as active tab
if you have a decent bt headphones and its quality of audio is bad (especialy in high freq - hiss, interference) try this trick. I have set it to 50, 40 was acceptable but not perfect
improves quality of bluetooth headphones (e.g. Nokia BH-504)
please let me know, cos I forgot to take note of it
Enables support for Zune HD syncing
Used to change the country for the Mac App Store.
Enables basic find as you type. Then restart OmniWeb, and use “/” to start an incremental find
To enable basic find as you type
If you keep pressing space, OW will select the next tab when you get to the bottom of the screen.
Allow space bar to move between tabs
change the length of time before OW fetches new content for Workspaces

Corresponds to "By default, check bookmarks every [number] [period]". Consists of an optional number followed by a unit. Units are "min" (for minutes), "hourly" (or "h"), "daily" (or "d"), "weekly", "monthly" (or "mo"), and "never". If the number is omitted it is interpreted as 1. For example, "5 hourly" indicates a check every five hours (not five times per hour). As a special case, 0 is interpreted as never, and other unadorned numbers are interpreted as intervals of minutes.
Indicates whether the bookmark page's editor pane is displayed.
Open personal bookmarks when OmniWeb starts up
Enables the display of the number of unviewed bookmarks as a badge on the application's dock icon, and the corresponding popup menu of unviewed bookmarks.
Show updated bookmarks in dock icon

Controls how many bookmarks we show when listing updated bookmarks in the Dock menu. If you have more than that, the "N updated bookmarks" header turns into an item which will open your bookmarks page.
The number of bookmarks to display in the "Most Visited" bookmarks group.
Allows a single-click on zap icons in the bookmarks window or address well to open the URL.
What to use as a sample set of bookmarks if the user doesn't have a personal bookmarks file. This is the name of a resource in OmniWeb's application bundle.

Controls whether or not OmniWeb archives form values when you create a bookmark on a page with form elements. Archived form values are stored along with the bookmark and are restored when the page is loaded from the bookmark.
Corresponds to the "Remember Downloads for:" popup; value is stored in seconds.
Enable network drive support in iMovie
Enable the "Rainbow" formatting menu item for foreground and background text. Disabled by default because of performance impact on use of large text bodies.
Disables the output of the link displaying memory information when the */memory* command is executed.
Scroll on the window to bring it to front.
Scroll to bring window to front
Type anywhere to start a new Tweet
Type anywhere to start a new Tweet
Hides the App when it is in the Background.
Compose window floats over all other windows.
Compose window floats over all windows
Width of tabs in the tab bar
Enable Trackpad Tap to Click at Login Screen
Enables (or disables) the floating help window in Snow Leopard and Lion (HelpViewer will adopt a more typical application interface with menus and a dock icon... and non-floating windows!)
Float window above others (Snow Leopard and Lion)
Disable the alert dialog on new mail notifications, allowing you to only use growl notifications.
Automatically open Transmit Disks after mounting
Turn on (very verbose) debugging messages in Console.
Turn off if you don't want the little animation that appears when switching
Automatically open Transmit Disks after mounting
Sets the folder searched by a new Tembo search
Just like Safari, OmniWeb supports full page zoom
suppresses iMovies Check for upgrade when opening iMovie.
Removes the Restart Button from login window
Remove Restart Button From Login Window
Set the amount of time before the screen saver should start on the login window.
Set idle time to before Starting Screen Saver on LoginWindow
Hide the shutdown button on the login window
Hide Shutdown Button on Login Window
set the default Network Authorization user name to user's short name.
user short name for Network Authorization Dialog Box.
set witch screen saver to use while at the loginwindow. (assuming one has been enabled)
Set witch Screen Saver to use at Loginwindow
Set Observe Max Computer Per Page up to 50 (apposed to the default max of 9 per page)
Max Number of computer that can be observed
Set the default compression used to store cover images downloaded.
Make noise to indicate a movie was added when using a scanner away from the computer.
Show unsupported networks in Disk Utility
When enabled, right clicking content in Dictionary allows you to open the WebKit inspector.
Enable WebKit Developer Extras in Dictionary.app
Specifies if all windows will be closed when Preview is quit, which means they'll reopen on the next launch in Lion.
The default font size for the project drawer is small. This can be used to increase it.
Animate opening and closing of windows
When performing a single-file "Replace All" operation, BBEdit will show a confirmation sheet showing the number of replacements performed.
Determines whether or not to restore any previously open windows when the application is relaunched

When using the Markup / Utilities / Translate Text to HTML command the default is for

tags to end up on their own lines above and below blocks of text.
Translated HTML paragraphs on separate lines
Font size zoom in Help Viewer
Zoom font size in Help Viewer

The font size (in points) to use for tooltips. This may also affect font size for text or UI elements such as text entries on some web pages. You must restart Safari for this to take effect.
This is the same setting as the System setting "Tooltip Font Size", but affects only Safari.
Enable AirDrop on not supportet macs
allow the Escape key to invoke the "Complete"
Terrain Quality setting as in Google Earth standalone app. 1 high quality, -2 low quality
Always show the iTunes icon in the notifications pop-up beside the current playing track.
Always show the iTunes icon in notifications
Shows the current playing iTunes track as a pop-up notification in the Dock.
When set to YES balance behavior is like previous versions of BBEdit
Select Text in Quick Look Windows
Enables or disables Lion's window opening animation
Enable System Wide Window Opening Animation
When saving in DoubleTake format, allows you to save a copy of the original images alongside the DoubleTake files. Checkbox appears in the "Save" dialog box.
when to change the speed in the accessary control(the TextField), the increment value when press ↑↓
Default menubar icon is a musical note. Can be changed to a heart.
Change Status Bar Icon To a Heart
Turn on to move down when deleting mail.
Sets the number of items of the Clipboard History feature. Allows you to set a higher number than the maximum of 40 exposed in the preferences dialog.
Number of items in Clipboard History
Enable the File Extension Change Warning
Allow showing a web inspector in any web view
Show control characters in text views
Enable slow-motion animations when holding shift
Find banner matches starts of words by default
Enable restoring windows when logging out and back in
Use a dark menu bar in full screen
Open a Finder window after extracting an archive
Enable the delay for showing the Dock in full screen
When you scroll to the end of a page in many apps, the page seems to continue scrolling a bit, then bounces back.
When you clean your Mac (delete language files etc.) you may get the warning Chocolat may be corrupted. This disables the warning

The font size (in points) to use for tooltips. This may also affect font size for text or UI elements. You must restart Mail for this to take effect.
This is the same setting as the System setting "Tooltip Font Size", but affects only Mail.
A multiplier which modifies the timing of the Dock hide/show animation
Stops on launch the preparation to restore previous open tabs. (quit 2x)
Disables automatic termination for idle applications in Lion and Mountain Lion.
Enable the backspace key to go back a page
By default, Mountain Lion will save new documents created in selected applications to iCloud
Default to saving new documents to iCloud
If enabled, files are always saved in Pixelmator's native PXM format by default.
Always use PXM format when opening documents
Enables the Photo Booth debug menu.
Locks the screen as soon as the user logins. Useful if the user wants to login automatically and lock the screen.
Show the release notes when Quicksilver is updated
Enable QuickLook previews in place of generic icons for files
Allow Quicksilver to install app and plugin updates automatically, and restart without asking
Fine-tune which file types get previews for aesthetic or performance reasons. Only applies if "Load Preview Icons" is enabled.
Enable drag lock on your trackpad, which is very helpful on dragging objects on your screen. Requires a tap on the trackpad to release objects from dragging.
Enables dragging of objects with the trackpad with click and hold.
Briefly highlight the opening delimiter when right-arrow-navigating over a closing delimiter
Additional qualifying names for searching the siblings of the file's parent for eligible counterparts
Comma-delimited list of folder name patterns for "Open Counterpart"
Append File Name Extensions when saving
The threshold at which the window is made to take up the entire screen
Show "Currently open Documents" pane when opening the second document in a new window
Numbers of matches shown when using "Open File by Name" and searching with Wildcards
Look into files when using "Text files only" filter in Disk Browser
Display anonymous Javascript functions in the function popup
Display anonymous ActionScript functions in the function popup
Delete a tab stop's worth of spaces if there are only spaces (and tabs) between the insertion point and the start of the line
Activate this, if you want your full-screen windows to consume screen real estate like a hungry wumpus
Apply the line-comment delimiter to the entire line containing the insertion point
"Camel case" navigation: Jump to the next (or previous) transition from lower-case to upper-case characters
Automatic word counting is disabled for documents over that size threshold, in order to avoid needless delays when working on very large documents
The maximum amount of text checked by "Find All Misspelled Words"
Text completions that depend on examining the document's contents are skipped when the document is above that size
Include the delimiters in the resulting selection when using the "Balance" command
Use block comments whenever possible (when using the Un/Comment command)
Sets the skip time for left arrow key.
Sets the skip time for right arrow key.
Enables or Disables Fast User Switching in the Menu Bar for managed installations in public labs
Enable-Disable Fast User Switching in the System UI Server Menu Bar
enables internal debug menu for Xcode
enables internal debug menu for Finder (may only be present in developer preview builds)
Show Debug Menu in Mac App Store
Change the week view in iCal. ie. 14 to display a 2 week view. Change to 7 for default 1 week view.
When true, all file extensions are shown.
Disables the blur found in Mavericks new Dock to create a clear Dock.
Use an audio file as a custom ringtone.
Scale images by default when printing
Enable Secrets preferences tab in OpenEmu preferences. It is also known as the internal debug menu.
Reopening files: Attempt to remount volumes that are not available
